Class LevelGuiElement

java.lang.Object
rekit.logic.gui.GuiElement
rekit.logic.gui.LevelGuiElement
Direct Known Subclasses:
LifeGui, ScoreGui
public abstract class LevelGuiElement
extends GuiElement
This class represents a GuiElement attached to a ILevelScene.
